name: metamorphic
description: A factory contract for creating metamorphic (i.e. redeployable) contracts.
author: 0age

scripts.all: ./node_modules/.bin/ganache-cli 2>&1 > ganache-output.log & echo 'local chain started.' && ./node_modules/.bin/truffle compile && node scripts/test/ci.js && ./node_modules/.bin/solhint 'contracts/**/*.sol'; kill -9 "$(ps -ax | grep '[b]in/node ./node_modules/.bin/ganache-cli' | awk '{print $1;}')" && echo 'local chain stopped.'
scripts.ci: ./node_modules/.bin/ganache-cli -q & echo 'local chain started.' && ./node_modules/.bin/truffle compile && node scripts/test/ci.js && ./node_modules/.bin/solhint 'contracts/**/*.sol'
scripts.stop: kill -9 "$(ps -ax | grep '[b]in/node ./node_modules/.bin/ganache-cli' | awk '{print $1;}')" && echo 'local chain stopped.'
